headline.main: New York Challenges Effectiveness of Cleanup in Hudson River
headline.print_headline: New York Challenges Effectiveness of Cleanup in Hudson River

docs.snippet: The state's conservation chief is challenging the effectiveness of recently completed dredging of contaminated sediment from the upper Hudson River, saying unacceptably high levels of industrial waste were left behind....
docs.lead_paragraph: The state's conservation chief is challenging the effectiveness of recently completed dredging of contaminated sediment from the upper Hudson River, saying unacceptably high levels of industrial waste were left behind.

headline.main: A Book Adds Rigor to the Laid-Back World of Tiki Cocktails
headline.print_headline: An Aesthetic Universe Under a Small Paper Umbrella

docs.snippet: The owners of the San Francisco tiki bar Smuggler’s Cove set out to define an aesthetic built on leis and umbrellas....
docs.abstract: Rebecca and Martin Cate, owners of tiki bar Smuggler's Cove in San Francisco, pen book Smuggler's Cove: Exotic Cocktails, Rum, and the Cult of Tiki; recipe for cocktail The Chadburn offered.

keywords.value: Smuggler's Cove: Exotic Cocktails, Rum, and the Cult of Tiki (Book)

docs.lead_paragraph: The owners of the San Francisco tiki bar Smuggler’s Cove set out to define an aesthetic built on leis and umbrellas.

headline.main: LME Cuts Ring Dealing Fees in Half for August
headline.print_headline: LME Cuts Ring Dealing Fees in Half for August

docs.snippet: The London Metal Exchange (LME) has cut fees in half for open outcry trades during August as a goodwill gesture after it had to vacate its premises because of structural problems, it said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The London Metal Exchange (LME) has cut fees in half for open outcry trades during August as a goodwill gesture after it had to vacate its premises because of structural problems, it said on Monday.

headline.main: Ryan Lochte Loses All His Major Sponsors After Rio Incident, Apology
headline.print_headline: Ryan Lochte Loses All His Major Sponsors After Rio Incident, Apology

docs.snippet: U.S. Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte lost all four of his major sponsors on Monday, including Speedo USA and Ralph Lauren Corp, following his apology for an "exaggerated" story about being robbed at gunpoint at the Rio Games....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Olympic swimmer Ryan Lochte lost all four of his major sponsors on Monday, including Speedo USA and Ralph Lauren Corp, following his apology for an "exaggerated" story about being robbed at gunpoint at the Rio Games.

headline.main: Speedo USA, 3 Other Sponsors Drop Lochte After Rio Incident
headline.print_headline: Speedo USA, 3 Other Sponsors Drop Lochte After Rio Incident

docs.snippet: Less than 24 hours after the close of the Rio Olympics, Ryan Lochte took a major financial hit Monday for a drunken incident he initially tried to pass off as an armed robbery....

headline.main: Concrete Block Thrown Off Danish Bridge Kills Tourist in Car
headline.print_headline: Concrete Block Thrown Off Danish Bridge Kills Tourist in Car

docs.snippet: Police say a heavy concrete block thrown from an overhead bridge onto a major highway in Denmark has killed a German woman and seriously injured her husband as their car passed underneath....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a heavy concrete block thrown from an overhead bridge onto a major highway in Denmark has killed a German woman and seriously injured her husband as their car passed underneath.

headline.main: Milwaukee Police Shooting Videos Will Not Yet Be Released: Official
headline.print_headline: Milwaukee Police Shooting Videos Will Not Yet Be Released: Official

docs.snippet: Milwaukee police body camera videos of an officer's fatal shooting of a black man on Aug. 13 will be not be released until an investigation is completed, Wisconsin's top law enforcement official said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Milwaukee police body camera videos of an officer's fatal shooting of a black man on Aug. 13 will be not be released until an investigation is completed, Wisconsin's top law enforcement official said on Monday.

headline.main: Republicans to Query Firms That Ran Clinton's Private Server
headline.print_headline: Republicans to Query Firms That Ran Clinton's Private Server

docs.snippet: Republicans stepped up their attacks Monday on former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's use of a private email server and pointed to newly released messages to allege that foreign donors to the Democratic presidential nominee's family charity g...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans stepped up their attacks Monday on former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's use of a private email server and pointed to newly released messages to allege that foreign donors to the Democratic presidential nominee's family charity got preferential treatment from her department.
